A command-line interface for Culberson's colouring programs.

Requirements
------------

To use the expect scripts directly
(see the Appendix)
requires

* Expect (http://expect.sourceforge.net/)

```
apt-get install expect
```

and

* Culberson's Coloring Programs (http://webdocs.cs.ualberta.ca/~joe/Coloring/Colorsrc/index.html)

Using ccli also requires:

* Bash >= 4.0
* Docopts (https://github.com/docopt/docopts)

```
cd /opt
git clone https://github.com/docopt/docopts.git
./get_docopts.sh
cp docopts /usr/local/bin
```

## ccli

### greedy

```{sh}
export PATH=$PATH:.

ccli greedy --type="simple"\
            --ordering="decdeg"\
            --seed=42\
            --kempe\
            ../queen-colouring/queen16_16.col
```

### dsatur

```{sh}
export PATH=$PATH:.

ccli dsatur --ordering="random"\
            --seed=42\
            ../queen-colouring/queen16_16.col
```

### maxis

```{sh}
export PATH=$PATH:.

ccli maxis --seed=42\
           ../queen-colouring/queen16_16.col
```

## Appendix

You can use each of the scripts individually. They have a very
different interface to ccli. These programs are all generated
by autoexpect.

### ccli_greedy

```{sh}
./lib/ccli_greedy ../queen-colouring/queen16_16.col 1 y 1 42 1
```

### ccli_dsatur

```{sh}
./lib/ccli_dsatur ../queen-colouring/queen16_16.col 1 1 42
```

### ccli_maxis

```{sh}
./lib/ccli_maxis ../queen-colouring/queen16_16.col 1 42
```
